content: the flag is worked from bottom to top from the red color and adding the black and green as you go in row the pattern is not difficult to follow and easy to achieve along with the video only 1 ball of yarn of each color is needed and only the single_crochet stitch is used materials 1yarn ball red black green cream crochet hook 7 mm measurements 53 cm/82 cm gauge 10cm 14 row/ 12 sts
